short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Compare Bricklink to Lego Pick a Brick, Save up to 80%

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Installation Guide 1. Download the Extension: Begin by downloading the extension from the Firefox Add-ons store. 2. Configure Your Settings: Go to the extension’s options and set up your country and language. Ensure these match the format of the LEGO website URL you use. For example, if you shop on "https://www.lego.com/en-lu/", set your country to ‘lu’ and your language to ‘en’. Using BricklCoin With BricklCoin activated, you’ll receive detailed insights when viewing your cart on BrickLink. After a brief loading period, the extension will display potential savings by comparing item prices between LEGO’s Pick a Brick (PAB) and BrickLink. You’ll see: - How much you could save by purchasing certain items directly from LEGO PAB. - The total savings achieved by buying through BrickLink. Additional Features - Add to LEGO PAB Cart: With a simple click, transfer items from your BrickLink cart to your LEGO PAB cart. Ensure you have an open tab where you are logged into your LEGO account for this feature to work. - Remove Items from BrickLink Cart: Easily remove transferred items from your BrickLink cart using the provided button. Enjoy more cost-effective shopping and make smarter decisions with BricklCoin!
